entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
